name: Bryan NC
text: Terrible location. Delivery fee is nearly $5 and driver always delivers to wrong address... EVEN WHEN WE CALL AHEAD AND LET THEM KNOW WE ARE AT CT AND NOT RD... Carry out order has been wrong 4/5 times in the last year. Because of COVID, they have an excuse for not checking to make sure they got it right and WILL NOT fix it. Awful.

name: Bryce Johnson
text: You know... Haven't had the best experience with this location. Usually my orders are wrong. Tonight I got the dinner box and got bread sticks with almost no seasoning, no icing with the dried out cinnamon sticks, and the pizza is a small handtossed. I seem to remember the pizzas in the dinner box being fairly large, square pan pizzas.

name: aaron captain
text: Every time I go in the gal at the front is so nice! Love the stuffed crust but the gal is so nice!! I appreciate hood service and people that are kind.

name: Sheri Daly
text: Order is always correct.The original pan crust I got tonight was so good.Please keep it on menu!The delivery guy waited on the stairs away from the door to make sure I got it.He was very niceüòÄ

name: Wissam Albshara
text: I love coming to this location . The workers are super nice and so welcoming .

name: Michelle
text: Got a medium pan pizza with half just plain cheese and the other half extra peppers and reg amt Pepperoni's. There was barely even one pepper on each slice. I asked the guy if they remembered to do extra on the peppers and he was super ‚Ä¶More

name: S S
text: This is the worst Pizza Hut I have experienced. The are always slow/late (30 to 45 mins slower than normal, even while in store waiting) and they really don't seem to care. I will use a different location from now on.

name: Matthew Barnhart
text: Had some issues with their online ordering, but the service at this location is good.

name: Anjanette Pettigrew
text: I requested contact less delivery due to an immune disease. The delivery driver rang the doorbell multiple times. I expected him to leave my order and go, but then he started banging on the door. Turns out, he likes my husband. Even after I ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian H.
text: I have pretty high standards for food, especially for a place to be my regular go-to. This PIzza Hut has easily earned five stars from me. I am truly impressed. The food is great, but the service is beyond amazing. I'm not sure if Miranda, ‚Ä¶More

name: R C
text: This location has just the friendliest folks working here. The food is always hot and we choose carry-out rather than delivery because of how great they are. Even open during 4-5 in of snow!

name: Linda Sanderson
text: Can never leave an order on the call in line it's always busy and no one ever answers it tried to order pizza twice through their call center and both times I never got it the order never went through,

name: Jacob Hertzka
text: Worst pizza hut lady was rude for no reason on the phone and was so quick to get off the phone and I come in and they got everything all messed up

name: Brad Tucker
text: Food was great. I wish the garlic knots had been a little hotter.

name: Joe Tapia
text: I'm puzzled at the fact that "Lori Fein" said that the pizza tasted like a frozen pizza???? well maybe she forgot to bake it in the oven before eating it when she has had frozen pizza!!!! Then again everyone's taste buds are different, I ‚Ä¶More

name: San Trujillo
text: Meat lovers,can't go wrong it was delicious.  Thanks to the cook.

name: Lori Fein
text: I would say not nasty but definitely not what it used to be. It basically tastes like a frozen pizza. Too bad Pizza Hut.....never again. BTW, don't call their telephone number as it goes to a "call center".

name: Katie Williams
text: Always great food and service at this location! They always open the box and show me the pizza when I pick up, so I don't get home and find out it's messed up then (looking at you, Domino's).

name: Erik Konig
text: We asked for the pizza to be ready in about an hour and it seemed to have been put in right away. It was still very tasty, albeit only being warm. Customer service was great, after calling to express concern we received credit for another. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jerry Dollar
text: Manage to keep running out of thin crust large. How difficult can it be to make some more when you see you are running low?

name: Josh Chil
text: The manager was awesome! Had a great experience. I'm used to waiting for 30 mins for a pizza but she nailed it in way less time than that. Thank you for the great experience!

name: Amanda Coleman
text: My family eats pizza often and decided to give pizza hut a try. That ended up being a bad decision. We recieved our pizza delivery and it was barely warm and the pizza was so soggy most of it was not edible.  Wouldn't have been as big of an issue if the pizza wasn't so pricey.

name: Dee J G
text: Awesome service

name: TJ Curry
text: 12 wings come as 9 really pizza was cold and wrong then they couldn't figure out how to send the right pizza

name: C F
text: Ordered from pizza hut after many years because the dipping bites on the TV commercial looked so good.   The edges on my pizza were burned and was informed by the person on site that it was because the cheese oozes out with that kind of ‚Ä¶More

name: JT Fugere
text: Hey guys, running low on pepperoni? You might want to see how your competitors are laying it down.

name: Derrick Gibson
text: Great crust. Grew up on Pizza Hut.

name: Jeff D
text:
Always Great Pizza. Friendly when I call. Very friendly tonight I had to write positive review. The drivers are always offering suggestions and are super
Love the Cheese bread sticks and Wings as well.
Also always on time and is fresh!

name: Crystal S
text: The quality was pretty disappointing this time, I asked for extra sauce but the pie was pretty dry. I love Pizza Hut but it wasn't great this visit.

name: Caleb Mandry
text: The closing lady said that our pizza was done but it was going to be another 10 minutes on the wings because they turned the fryer off early. Thankfully she offered to keep the pizza drying out in the warmer oven the whole time for us.

name: Christy Ball
text: My pizza taste like cardboard...Worst pizza I've had in months!

name: Jacob Moore
text: Took a bit too long for the carryout option, but fresh and tasty pizza.

name: James McLarty
text: Great sale for a large 2-topping pizza!

name: Johnny Shoots
text: I probably get something from this Pizza Hut every other week. I give them 5 stars because I don't believe they've messed up an order yet. Which as many of you know that's impressive for a pizza place. So many different options and orders ‚Ä¶More

text: Delicious and quick

name: John Doe
text: Worst ever bad service and bad pizza

name: N. John Schofield
text: Order wasn't ready when they said when I did get my pizza it was kind of cold so not sure how that happened

name: Mandy Huang
text: The last time I ordered here was like 9th months ago I'm pretty positive??.. Here's the reason why. The first time I ordered here, it took extremely long, 45min-1hour?? More like 1hour and 30 minutes. They barely gave any of the toppings I ‚Ä¶More

name: Shobbzane
text:
Placed an order at 6:15pm, I watched the ‚Äútracker‚Äù for about an hour and a half, it said my food was being made.
When I called to check on it, he said, ‚ÄúSooo... We send your pizza out for ‚Ä¶More

name: Beth Sanford
text: They forgot to put our dessert pizza in I waited for a half hour and when I got home our food was cold and not good. They gave me a $10.00 credit for next time because I waited so long. But I dont think we are going to go back. Plus they won't deliver to us since our house is not on Google maps yet. :(

name: Morgan Brown
text: I always have  a good experience with this pizza hut they get food out earlier than expected and it's always amazing.

name: Lauren Chessmore
text: Ordered 3 pizzas and 2 different kinds of wings, the pizzas were ok,  better quality from Little Ceasars. If it weren't for the fact my son requested stuffed crust we would have ordered Domino's.  The wings were tasteless to say the least, ‚Ä¶More

name: Laura Warren
text: They put cheese on cheeseless pizza both times ive order. Other reviews have said similar things. Seems like they need to slow down. They fixed it fast and were nice on the phone though. Delivery driver was rude/weird ?? Maybe a little of both. Neighbors get free pizza though lol

name: Greg Burgess
text: I can't get them to deliver to my area online,  but if I call them they will. This makes absolutely no sense when you can only get some special offers through online. Thanks for screwing your customers.

name: paula kidd
text: Pizza under cooked 3 different times we ordered and stingy with toppings

name: Reagan Williams
text: Worst pizza I‚Äôve ever gotten from them. The middle of my pizza was missing!!

name: michael oneil
text: The staff is always nice and my order is always ready when they say it will be.

name: Jermaine Johnson
text: Absolutely awful. Pizza was sparse in everything except dough. Ordered a 2 topping pizza and there were some slices that had nothing but light sauce on them with a sprinkle of cheese. Breadsticks were crusty and burnt. Committing this experience to memory so that we will never go to this Pizza Hut again!

name: Alfred Maynard
text: Decent pizza that is comparable to the other pizza places within a five mile radius (Blackjack,  Louie's Pizza, and Dominoes).  The customer service is mixed; sometime you can get an great cashier who is polite and efficient; other times they are jerks and won't give you the time of day.

name: Stephanie Rivas
text: Delivery was late and was cold by the time it got to me. My breadsticks where very over cooked and hard couldn't even eat them. Not very happy with my service here tonight. Don't think I will be going back to Pizza Hut

name: Alexia G
text: Great service and very helpful staff. Delicious thin crust chicken supreme!

name: Zach Engelman
text: They accidentally put cheese on my cheese-less pizza but were quick to correct this error. Helpful staff!

name: Jamie Kaminga
text: Best Pizza Hut pizza and breadsticks I've had in a long time! Amazing! Friendly staff too!

name: JayMichael Neill
text: Best place for delivery pizza in the local area.  Order online and get the deals!  Delivery personnel are friendly.

name: David lee
text: Pizza has given me a stomach ache multiple times. Do not recommend

name: angel avila
text: Called in to order a Pizza and wings. Was debating the wings so called back in and asked about pricing. Was contemplating whether I should get a 6 or 12 piece when the girl I was on the phone with (Jeneva) who I'm assuming was in a rush to ‚Ä¶More

name: Silver Yoshi
text: The manager is a complete jerk, and when I ordered triple extra cheese and got it delivered, there was hardly any cheese on it. I called back and complained, wishing to exchange the pizza that i hadn't eaten a bite of for a new one, and he ‚Ä¶More

name: sgordon41183
text: Ok, not the greatest pizza but  better Than others

name: Tabitha Fornah
text: Make sure they're charging you right.  Ordered 2 things of the $5 menu and they told me my total was $19. Their website tried doing the same thing.

name: Casey
text: Great pizza. Always ordered via the app and never had issues.

name: Jill Sullivan
text: Love their pizza.. Pineapple and green pepper on hand tossed crust with garlic herb crust.. Yummm

name: Justin Mullins
text: Been there twice now. Terrible service on carryouts. The movement in the restaurant is similar to that of a ground sloth. This past time in: 7 minutes to receive my order (which was waiting on the shelf) from walking in, and I was the only ‚Ä¶More

name: Harrison
text: i ordered here when i was staying from out of town, woke up a few hours throwing it up at 3 am. felt better after that

name: Shanikwa Adams
text: I can understand being busy but at least make sure my food is hot when I get it. On top of that when I call to confront the situation keep your snotty ass attitude to yourself.

name: Sam Sweet
text: The fact that I could order two sides and have it be more than $20 is nuts conaidering I could get a full meal elsewhere. Then to have your wings with no buffalo is just crazy.

name: Jessica S
text: It's a Pizza Hut. They all use the same food, so you either like it or you don't. Four stars only because I've eaten from here multiple times and even providing about a 5 minute buffer, I still usually have to wait 5 to 10 minutes more beyond the pick up time.

name: andrew f0609
text: Worst pizza ever! We were transfered 6 times to pizza Huts less that 1 mile away but in the end we got our pizza so I'll give them that

name: Amber Walsh
text: Will never be ordering pizza from this place again. Took over 45 min to get our food and the food we got was extremely cold and had no taste. Never spend my money here again.

name: Jordan Morrison
text: Love stuffed crust pizza!

name: Nukuku Nuku
text: Fast, friendly and they delivered on time in a snow storm. Thanks guys!

name: Ryan Hockett
text: Ordered from them twice messed up my order both times. Was going to try them again call they pick up the phone and put it down so I could hear them work. I will never try again and tell everyone I can to never use that Pizza Hut!!!
